function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Centralization of the IEQ monitoring system may lead to a single point of failure for the entire system, increasing the risk of widespread impact if the central system fails.","Impact":"Potential loss of monitoring and control capabilities for the entire building, leading to compromised indoor environmental quality (IEQ) and potential health risks.","Mitigation":"Implement redundant monitoring and control systems to distribute the risk of system failure. Regular maintenance and testing of the central system to ensure its reliability.","Technologies":"Distributed control systems, fault-tolerant monitoring systems, regular system maintenance and testing protocols.","People":"Building occupants, facilities management, maintenance staff.","Owner":"Facilities management, building owners, system maintenance team."},{"Description":"Alarms are generated when nodes are not working properly, indicating a risk of delayed identification and resolution of node malfunctions.","Impact":"Inaccurate and delayed monitoring of indoor environmental quality (IEQ), leading to potential health risks and compromised building performance.","Mitigation":"Implement real-time monitoring and automated alerts for node malfunctions. Regular inspection and maintenance of monitoring nodes to prevent malfunctions.","Technologies":"Real-time monitoring systems, automated alert systems, preventive maintenance protocols.","People":"Building occupants, facilities management, maintenance staff.","Owner":"Facilities management, building owners, system maintenance team."},{"Description":"Data captured from smart IEQ sensor nodes is stored in text files, posing a risk of data security and integrity.","Impact":"Potential unauthorized access, manipulation, or loss of IEQ data, compromising the accuracy and reliability of monitoring and analysis.","Mitigation":"Implement encryption and access control measures for stored data. Regular data backups and integrity checks to detect and prevent data tampering.","Technologies":"Data encryption, access control systems, data backup and integrity verification tools.","People":"Building occupants, IT security team, data management team.","Owner":"Facilities management, IT department, data management team."}]}
